name: Cecil & Dawson Asylum
description:
Cecil and Dawson Asylum is a text adventure in which you enter the fictional abandoned Cecil & Dawson Asylum. Things take a turn for the worst however when you manage to lock yourself inside with nothing other than a torch. There's clearly no way of escaping so you must go _deeper and deeper_ into the facility and in doing so go _deeper and deeper_ into its dark history. 

Controls

The controls are easy. At the end of each passage you are provided with a number of different options you can choose from. These could be to move between rooms or interact with items.

Saving

The game includes a save/load allowing you to save your game or load back into a previous version. All you need to do is interact with the save and load buttons in the sidebar on the left.

Platforms

Google Chrome: Yes

Mozilla Firefox: Yes

Microsoft Edge: Yes

Internet Explorer: No

The Source Code

In order to properly examine the source code you just need to download Twine 2 and drag the index.html found below into it.

Tools and Software Used

**Programming**: Twine 2

**Graphics**: GIMP
**Music** Audacity, Bosca Ceoil (pronounced Key-ole)
